text: @GovRicketts How are you going to #CrushTheCurve if you don’t know where it is? What are you hiding? I’ll bet it’s what @TysonFoods wants you to hide. Meatpackers dying of #COVIDー19 Nebraska stops releasing coronavirus data from meat plants after cases spike https://t.co/yZvLYAszYj
